com.tigertext.ttandroid.settings

Class SettingsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tigertext.ttandroid.settings.SettingsManager

  • public class SettingsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all TigerText settings for the current account and organizations

    • Method Summary

      • get

        public java.lang.Object get(@NonNull
                            SettingType settingType)

        Parameters:

        java.lang.Exception

      • updateAvatarOnServer

        public void updateAvatarOnServer(@Nullable
                                 GenericAPICallStatusListener listener)
        Updates the previously saved avatar image and updates the current user's avatar on the server
        Parameters:
        listener - An optional listener to get the result of the update
        See Also:
        should be called before this

      • updateAvatar

        public boolean updateAvatar(java.io.File file,
                            java.lang.String mimetype)
        Updates the Avatar given the File (image) and the mimetype into the local storage for easy upload.
        Parameters:
        file -
        mimetype - The mimetype of the given file
        Returns:
        True if saving the avatar locally was successful, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        To upload the avatar afterwards.

        public void close()
        Do not call this directly. This will be called during logout.

      • hasDisabledCapability

        public boolean hasDisabledCapability(java.lang.String disabledCapability)
        Helper to easily determine if a disabled capability is set fr the current user.
        Parameters:
        disabledCapability - The disabled capability to check
        Returns:
        True if the given disabled capability is set, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        SettingType.DISABLED_CAPABILITIES
